1.name: Kamala Harris
1.description: 2024 President Elect of the Democratic Party

1.title: Emotionally Charged Language
1.content: The user consistently employs emotionally charged language to critique and cast Donald Trump in a negative light, emphasizing alleged threats to democracy and individual freedoms.
evidence:
With this election, our nation has a precious, fleeting opportunity to move past the bitterness, cynicism, and divisive battles of the past.

A chance to chart a new way forward.

In November, reproductive freedom and democracy are on the ballot. 

Donald Trump would continue to dismantle these freedoms.  

We need to fight. And we know when we fight, we win.
Donald Trump is threatening access to contraception.

Trump bows down to dictators. He makes America weak. 

That is disqualifying for someone who wants to be Commander-in-Chief.

While Trump relentlessly attacks reproductive freedoms, @JoeBiden and I will never stop fighting to protect them. 

Americans have repeatedly made it clear they want more freedom, not less, and they will make their voices heard at the ballot box again this November.

Donald Trump has vowed that he will be a dictator on “day one.” 

He is a threat to our democracy and our fundamental freedoms.

The contrast is clear: Donald Trump lied over and over and over again during the debate. 

He would not disavow what happened on January 6.

He would not give a clear answer on whether he would stand by the election results.

Let’s make one thing clear, Donald Trump intended to get rid of Roe and rip away fundamental freedoms from Americans.

And he will not stop there.

900 pages that would hand Donald Trump unprecedented power to:

Ban abortion nationwide.
Rip away affordable health care.
Cancel student loan relief.
And much more.

We will defeat his dangerous Project 2025 agenda at the ballot box in November.

He said we should “punish” women who have an abortion.
He said he is “proud” of his role in ending Roe.
He unleashed extreme abortion bans across the country. 

Donald Trump’s record and position on reproductive freedom are clear.

Senate Republicans blocked a bill that protects the right to contraception.

We deserve better.
Donald Trump has told us who he is. A second Trump term would mean more bans, more suffering, and less freedom.

Donald Trump is a threat to our democracy and fundamental freedoms. 

President @JoeBiden and I will continue fighting to restore Roe, protect our democracy, and address our gun violence epidemic. 

The contrast could not be clearer.

When you read Donald Trump’s 2025 agenda, you will see he intends to cut Social Security and Medicare, give tax breaks to billionaires, end the Affordable Care Act, and more. 

We are not going back.

This afternoon, Donald Trump spoke to the National Association of Black Journalists.

It was the same old show.

Let me just say: The American people deserve better than Donald Trump’s divisiveness and disrespect.

Donald Trump and his allies would limit access to birth control, ban medication abortion, and enact a nationwide abortion ban.

Simply put, they are out of their minds.

It’s simple: Donald Trump is a threat to our democracy and fundamental freedoms.

With your vote, we will stop him this November.

This campaign is not just about us versus Donald Trump.  

Our campaign is about fighting for the future.

Trump’s Project 2025:

–Bans abortion nationwide
–Cuts Social Security 
–Eliminates the Department of Education
–Repeals our $35 cap on insulin for seniors
–Limits access to contraception

Donald Trump continues to brag about overturning Roe v. Wade.

He calls cruel abortion bans “a beautiful thing to watch.” 

How dare he.
Donald Trump wants to turn our democracy into a dictatorship.

2.title: Selective Evidence Against Opponent
2.content: The user consistently highlights potential negative consequences of Donald Trump's possible actions and policies, focusing on areas such as restrictions on personal freedoms, health and contraception access, electoral integrity, and economic strategies. This pattern is indicative of the user's attention to selectively releasing information that portrays Trump in a negative light in order to mobilize political sentiment against him.
evidence:
Trump’s Project 2025:

–Bans abortion nationwide
–Cuts Social Security 
–Eliminates the Department of Education
–Repeals our $35 cap on insulin for seniors
–Limits access to contraception

The states with the highest rates of maternal mortality all have abortion bans. And so-called leaders suggest these bans are in the best interest of women and children.

The hypocrisy abounds.

Donald Trump and his allies would limit access to birth control, ban medication abortion, and enact a nationwide abortion ban.

Simply put, they are out of their minds.

In November, reproductive freedom and democracy are on the ballot. 

Donald Trump would continue to dismantle these freedoms.  

We need to fight. And we know when we fight, we win.

Trump’s Project 2025 is a plan to return America to a dark past:

–Failed trickle-down economic policies
–Union busting
–Tax breaks for billionaires
–Blocking student loan forgiveness

Can you believe they put that in writing?

The contrast is clear: Donald Trump lied over and over and over again during the debate. 

He would not disavow what happened on January 6.

He would not give a clear answer on whether he would stand by the election results.

900 pages that would hand Donald Trump unprecedented power to:

Ban abortion nationwide.
Rip away affordable health care.
Cancel student loan relief.
And much more.

We will defeat his dangerous Project 2025 agenda at the ballot box in November.

He said we should “punish” women who have an abortion.
He said he is “proud” of his role in ending Roe.
He unleashed extreme abortion bans across the country. 

Donald Trump’s record and position on reproductive freedom are clear.
Donald Trump is threatening access to contraception.

I have often challenged Trump and so-called leaders who say that an abortion ban is in the best interest of women and children, yet stay silent on maternal mortality. 

The hypocrisy abounds.
Donald Trump has told us who he is. A second Trump term would mean more bans, more suffering, and less freedom.

Donald Trump hand-picked three members of the Supreme Court who would overturn the protections of Roe v. Wade.

As he intended, they did—and now he wants to pass a nationwide abortion ban. 

I will not let that happen.

While Trump relentlessly attacks reproductive freedoms, @JoeBiden and I will never stop fighting to protect them. 

Americans have repeatedly made it clear they want more freedom, not less, and they will make their voices heard at the ballot box again this November.

Donald Trump hand-picked three members of the Supreme Court with the intention that they would undo the protections of Roe v. Wade.

They did as he intended.

Trump is the architect of this health care crisis.

We need to fight. And we know when we fight, we win.
Whenever reproductive rights—in red states or blue states—have been on the ballot post-Dobbs, the American people voted for freedom.

He said we should “punish” women who have an abortion.

He unleashed extreme abortion bans across the country. 

Donald Trump’s record and position on reproductive freedom are clear.

This campaign is not just about us versus Donald Trump.  

Our campaign is about fighting for the future.

Since Roe was overturned, reproductive freedom has won in every election where it was on the ballot.

From Kansas to Ohio, the people of America have overwhelmingly voted in favor of freedom.

Momentum is on our side.

While Trump relentlessly attacks reproductive freedoms, @JoeBiden and I will never stop fighting to protect them. 

Americans have repeatedly made it clear they want more freedom, not less, and they will make their voices heard at the ballot box again this November.
